short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces YouTube comments with a reminder that You're Beautiful.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One of the quickest ways to feel bad about yourself (and the world in general) is to dive into the abyss of YouTube comments.

The Feel Good Comments extension replaces that whole section of YouTube with a simple reminder: You're Beautiful.
